00028 // Used to throw the appropriate error as noted by errno
00029 void ThrowError() throw (StorageKit::Error) {
00030     switch (errno) {
00031         case ENAMETOOLONG:
00032             throw new StorageKit::Error(errno, "Specified pathname is too long");
00033             break;
00034             
00035         default:
00036             throw new StorageKit::Error(errno);
00037             break;
00038     }
00039 }

00042 StorageKit::FileDescriptor StorageKit::Open(const char *path,
00043 StorageKit::OpenMode mode) throw (StorageKit::Error) {
00044     // Choose the proper posix flags
00045     int posix_flags;
00046     switch (mode) { 
00047         case READ: 
00048             posix_flags = O_RDONLY; // Read only
00049             break; 
00050         case WRITE: 
00051             posix_flags = O_WRONLY; // Write only 
00052             break; 
00053         case READ_WRITE: 
00054             posix_flags = O_RDWR;   // Read/Write
00055             break;       
00056     }
00057     
00058     // Add in O_CREAT so the file will be created if necessary
00059     posix_flags &= O_CREAT;
00060     
00061     // Choose rwxrwxrwx as default persmissions
00062     mode_t posix_mode = S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG | S_IRWXO;
00063     
00064     // Open the file
00065     FileDescriptor result = ::open(path, posix_flags, posix_mode);
00066     
00067     // Check for errors
00068     if (result == -1)
00069         ThrowError();
00070     
00071     return result;
00072 }
